General.Name: Prodigy Public Company Limited
General.Description: Prodigy Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes polyethylene terephthalate (PET) packaging products in Thailand. It offers PET bottles for drinking water, juices, vegetable oils, seasoning sauces, and preforms, as well as plastic bottles and containers. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

1.Name: Ms. Lakkanar  Romruen
1.Title: Exec. Director, CFO and Financial & Accounting Mang.
